definition: aircraft carrier/abbr. for 航空母艦|航空母舰[hang2 kong1 mu3 jian4]

sentences.english: The American carrier George Washington was slated to participate in the drill.
sentences.chinese: 美国的华盛顿号航母被派遣参与这次演习。

sentences.english: I also believe an attack on a us carrier with a strategic missle would lead to nuclear retaliation.
sentences.chinese: 我也相信用战略导弹攻击美国航母会导致核报复。

sentences.english: Finally, Varyag is clearly China's "starter" carrier.
sentences.chinese: 最后，瓦良格号显然是中国航母的“启动器”。

sentences.english: Enterprise CV-6 was the second of the three Yorktown-class carriers.
sentences.chinese: “企业”号是第二艘约克城级航母。

sentences.english: Today, a Navy supercarrier sails with a 70-strong air wing.
sentences.chinese: 现在，一艘海军超级航母约可载机七十多架。

sentences.english: Obviously, this aircraft carrier is the unusual grandness .
sentences.chinese: 可见，这艘航母是非常的雄伟。

sentences.english: The Navy rolls through Guam with an entire carrier group, " Niemi continues."
sentences.chinese: “海军控制着关岛和整个航母舰队，”涅米继续说道。

sentences.english: Shi Lang will sail into a Pacific Ocean teeming with carriers.
sentences.chinese: “施琅”将去航母如云的太平洋巡逻。

sentences.english: Liang was the highest-ranking official to recently declare the country's need for carriers.
sentences.chinese: 据悉，梁是近来正式表态中国需要航母的最高官员。

sentences.english: The US would never gripe about a Chinese carrier off its shore.
sentences.chinese: 美国就不会为中国航母来美国海岸感到烦忧。

sentences.english: Just one large, high-speed anti-ship missile could put a carrier out of action.
sentences.chinese: 只要一枚大型高速反舰导弹就能让一艘航母瘫痪。

sentences.english: The tactics of long-range fire assaulting on aircraft carrier battle groups is the typical network-centric tactics.
sentences.chinese: 远程火力突袭航母战斗群战法是典型的网络中心战法。

sentences.english: They build a carrier in less than 5 years. We take 3 times longer.
sentences.chinese: 他们造一艘航母不用5年，而我们要3倍以上的时间。

sentences.english: S. troops and a nuclear-powered aircraft carrie have already been dispatched to assist.
sentences.chinese: 美国部队和核动力航母亦已被派遣前往协助。

sentences.english: The navy's biggest vessels currently are a pair of smaller helicopter carriers.
sentences.chinese: 日本海军目前最大的军舰是两艘较小的直升机航母。

sentences.english: But for routine patrols, the Navy should have a larger number of smaller flattops.
sentences.chinese: 但对于日常巡逻，海军应该拥有更多数量的轻型航母。

definition: aircraft carrier/CL:艘[sou1]/(coll.) (fig.) sth huge/(like) a whale
Liaoning, the first aircraft carrier commissioned into the PLA Navy (commissioned in 2012)

pinyin: he2 dong4 li4 hang2 kong1 mu3 jian4
gong1 ji1 xing2 he2 qian2 ting3

definition: aircraft carrier/abbr. for 航空母艦|航空母舰[hang2 kong1 mu3 jian4]
